class.name: Config
class.description: Stores all the global configuration settings for the app.

class.name: Database
class.description: Used to make a connection and send queries to the database.

class.name: View
class.description: Contains all the functions for setting up and rendering views.

class.name: AuthHelper
class.description: Contains Helper methods for authentication purposes.

class.name: PageController
class.description: Used for displaying basic pages that don't quite fit in other controllers.

class.name: UserController
class.description: Used for the user details page.

class.name: VehicleController
class.description: Used for all the vehicle actions.

class.name: LoginController
class.description: Used for all the login functionality.

class.name: CarparkController
class.description: Used for car park pages and actions.

class.name: CarparkModel
class.description: Used for interacting with the Carpark table in the database.

class.name: VehicleModel
class.description: Used for interacting with the Vehicle table in the database.

class.name: UserModel
class.description: Used for interacting with the User table in the database.
